title: Bloomberg Markets: Equifax Names Temporary CEO Post Breach
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Equifax Names Temporary CEO Post Breach
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Jenny Surane\u0010Payments & Regional Bank Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing Equifax named an interim leader after exposing sensitive data on 143 million Americans, picking a seven-year insider who’s spent most of his time there focusing on business abroad.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
